H0.text: According to the Old Testament, who was the wife of Abraham and the mother of Isaac . Rebekah

H1.text: According to the Old Testament, who was the wife of Abraham and the mother of Isaac . Rachel

H2.text: According to the Old Testament, who was the wife of Abraham and the mother of Isaac . Leah

H3.text: According to the Old Testament, who was the wife of Abraham and the mother of Isaac . SARAH

A4.text: By her union with Abraham, Sarah had one child, Isaac.

A5.text: Sarah is the wife of Abraham.
